title: Contra las cuerdas
overview: Ezequiel, a boxer, who must escape from his home province for refusing to lose a fight arranged for money in advance. His new life will take him to Greater Buenos Aires, to meet again with his brother Luciano, with whom he will star in a love triangle that has Ana as its booty. Ana is a journalism student and employee of the neighborhood Cooperative and will take Ezequiel and Luciano to get involved in all kinds of dramatic situations. The young woman is also the daughter of the owner of the local pool and also a neighborhood leader, honest and hardworking, whom Ezequiel will save his life in a fight he has with criminals whom he wants to throw out of the neighborhood.Â
